abstract: United Nations reports that nearly 1,500 Iraqis were killed while battling Islamic State in June, up more than 40 percent from May.
lead_paragraph: At least 1,466 Iraqis were killed in episodes of armed conflict in June, up more than 40 percent from the previous month.

headline.main: Iraq: Toll From Clashes Rises, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iraq: Toll From Clashes Rises, U.N. Says

snippet: At least 1,466 Iraqis were killed in episodes of armed conflict in June, up more than 40 percent from the previous month.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
